title: Document Patient Vitals
description: A medical assistant needs to document a patient's vital signs (blood pressure, heart rate, temperature, respiratory rate) in the EHR.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly locates and opens the patient's chart for their current visit.

tasks.description: Navigate to the vitals signs flowsheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accesses the correct section of the EHR for documenting vitals.

tasks.description: Enter the values for blood pressure, heart rate, temperature, and respiratory rate, and save the flowsheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters all vital signs, and the data is saved to the patient's chart.
